# ERA Town Hall Meeting

**Date:** August 21, 2024 | **Duration:** 121 mins

**Links:** [View Meeting](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=view_recording_link&utm_medium=email) | [Ask Fathom](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=ask_fathom&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=ask_fathom&utm_medium=email)

## ACTION ITEMS ✨

- [ ] [Provide recommendations for cover crops and permaculture design to support Colombo's agroforestry project](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=5492.5999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Connect Colombo with resources and experts for agroforestry and regenerative agriculture systems to maximize land productivity](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=6625.9599&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Include project budget details, map, and tree species list in updated PowerPoint presentation](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=6729.659899&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Write proposal to larger community including link to donation button for Colombo's project](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=6908.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)


## Meeting purpose

## Key Takeaways

- [Diverse intelligence research provides frameworks for recognizing and interacting with unconventional forms of cognition in nature](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=720.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Bioelectric signaling acts as a "cognitive glue" allowing cellular collectives to exhibit goal-directed behavior and problem-solving](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=2505.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ERA is considering supporting Colombo's reforestation project in Uganda through a matching grant program](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=5376.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ERA is developing a new member directory to facilitate connections and support within the alliance](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=7172.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Topics

### Diverse Intelligence Research (Dr. Michael Levin presentation)

- [Aims to develop frameworks for recognizing intelligence in unfamiliar embodiments beyond typical animal brains](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=720.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Focuses on emergent cognition rather than just emergent complexity in biological systems](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=737.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Studies bioelectricity as a "cognitive glue" allowing cellular collectives to coordinate and solve problems](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=2505.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Examines how groups of cells navigate "anatomical space" to achieve body patterning goals during development and regeneration](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=2179.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Demonstrates reprogrammability of biological systems through bioelectric manipulation (e.g. inducing eyes or extra heads)](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=2279.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Explores creation of novel organisms ("xenobots") from frog embryo cells to study emergent behaviors and competencies](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=3698.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Argues for expanding notions of agency, cognition and "thinkers" beyond conventional physical objects](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=4279.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Ecosystem Restoration Project in Uganda (Colombo presentation)

- [Aims to restore 150 acres of degraded land in Nakivale refugee settlement through agroforestry](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=5497.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Has secured 300 acres of land and commitments for tree seedlings from government agencies](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=5901.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Plans to use contour ditches, organic fertilizer, and mixed tree species (pine, baobab, moringa, forest trees)](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=6048.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Requesting $4,500 from ERA to complete $19,500 total budget](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=6217.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Seeks technical advice on permaculture design and species selection](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=6344.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Will engage local community members for labor through village savings groups](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=6745.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### ERA Member Directory

- [New online directory being developed with public and private member profiles](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=7083.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Members will be able to customize information shared and search for other members](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=7098.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Will include optional badges for financial supporters of ERA](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=7187.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Next Steps

- [ERA to create donation mechanism for Colombo's project on Open Collective site](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=5461.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Colombo to add budget details and map to project presentation slides](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=6719.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ERA to connect Colombo with permaculture/agroforestry experts for technical advice](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=6488.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ERA to send invitations for members to claim and customize directory profiles](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=7091.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Members encouraged to consider recurring donations to support ERA initiatives](https://fathom.video/share/3MEMgX_G1hHaab-P9s1WhJGeTVw51EVo?tab=summary&timestamp=7187.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
